emails.added_to_event_subject: You have been added to an event
emails.added_to_event_text: Hello %s, team %s added you to the event %s on Sportfolios. Click on the following button to see the event.
emails.added_to_team_subject: You have been added to a team
emails.added_to_team_text: You have been added to the team %s on Sportfolios. Click on the following button to see the team.
emails.cart_item_added_player_text: Your team %s is now officially registered to %s. You can now go pay your indivdual fees in your cart
emails.email_confirmation_text: To confirm your email, please click on the following button
emails.import_member_text:
%s is currently transferring its registration platform to Sportfolios!ðŸŽ‰
We noticed that you are currently an active member of %s. Here are the steps towards transferring your membership to their new platform.
Your code is %s

1) Go to your settings on Sportfolios.
2) Enter your code %s in the coupon code section.
3) You should now be a member of %s!
emails.import_member_non_existing_text:
%s is currently transferring its registration platform to Sportfolios!ðŸŽ‰
We noticed that you are currently an active member of %s. Here are the steps towards transferring your membership to their new platform.
Your code is %s

1) Sign up to Sportfolios.
2) Once you are logged into the platform, you should be redirected to your user settings. Otherwise, you can reach them here: https://sportfolios.app/page/userSettings.
3) Enter your code %s in the coupon code section.
4) You should now be a member of %s!
emails.other_team_submitted_score: The team %s submitted the score: %s : %s %s : %s for your match of the event %s. Do you want to confirm this result?
emails.person_registration_text: %s is officially registered to %s. You can now go pay your individual fees in your cart

emails.recovery_email_text: You forgot your password? Click here to get it back
emails.score_submission_request_text: Hello %s One of your game from the event %s just ended. Please submit your score on Sportfolios.
emails.send_receipt_text: To see your receipt, click on the following button.
emails.team_refused_registration_text: The event %s has refused the registration of your team %s. You can contact the organization of the event to have more information on your registration denial.
emails.person_refused_registration_text: The event %s has refused the registration of %s. You can contact the organization of the event to have more information on your registration denial.
emails.team_unregistered_text: The event %s has unregistered your team %s from their event. You can contact the organization of the event to have more information on your unregistration.
emails.team_unregistered_and_refunded_text: The event %s has unregistered your team %s from their event. Your team and your players will receive the refund in the next few days. You can consult your updated receipt in your purchases.
emails.team_registration_free_text: Your team %s is officially registered to %s.
emails.team_registration_text: Your team %s is officially registered to %s The event is awaiting your payment. You can pay it now.
